page.title: 11LIFE IN KNIGHTSRIDGE
page.content: I live in Knightsridge in Livingston and have done so all my life. I don't think there are enough play facilities - all we have are a couple of swings and some chutes dotted around. There is only one big park and it's really supposed to be a football pitch. I think that some of the houses in Knightsridge are nice. I like my house, it is a four apartment terraced villa, and it is close to the woods but some of the trees are being knocked down and this spoils it. There are shops near my house too but the area is very littered and vandalism is rife. The shops all have metal shutters to protect them but these too are covered in graffiti. The area is being renovated at the moment and this should help Knightsridge to become a better place.
